sn48.67:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci jambudipaka rukkha, jambu tesam aggamakkhayati;
sn48.67:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiya dhamma, pannindriyam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya.
sn48.67:1.4: Saddhindriyam, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati.
sn48.67:1.8: pannindriyam bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati.
sn48.67:1.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci jambudipaka rukkha, jambu tesam aggamakkhayati;
sn48.67:1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiya dhamma, pannindriyam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya”ti.
